aboutUsPage.title: About Us
aboutUsPage.text: Good things happen when people can move, whether across town or toward their dreams. Opportunities appear, open up, become reality. What started as a way to tap a button to get a ride has led to billions of moments of human connection as people around the world go all kinds of places in all kinds of ways with the help of our technology.

bookingOptionsPage.title: Select City
bookingOptionsPage.btn3: Order, and the driver will call you
bookingOptionsPage.voiceOrderMsg:
1) Press and hold button.
2) After sound signal legible say сar pick-up address.
3) Please keep the microphone close to your face that we can hear you.
4) In this matter, the main thing is not to rush, so that we will definitely understand you.
Already impatient to hear your voice.
Have a nice day and a comfortable trip for you.

trackingPage.covidSOPs:
Your trip is started.Please read COVID - 19 SOPs carefully.

⦿ Keep your distance from other people when you travel, where possible.
⦿ Avoid making unnecessary stops during your journey.
⦿ Wear a mask on your face.
⦿ Plan ahead, check for disruption before you leave, and avoid the busiest routes, as well as busy times.
⦿ Wash or sanitise your hands regularly.
